head.title: Java document merging API | merge & manage Word, Excel, PDF, XPS, EPUB
head.description: Java API for document merging. Merge, split, reorder, swap, and remove pages from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, XPS, and EPUB files.

header.description: A versatile API for merging, splitting, and modifying PDF and Office documents
